text: Te, kotorym My darovali pisaniye, raduyutsya tomu, chto nisposlano tebe (t. ye. Koranu). A sredi [drugikh] grupp yest' takiye, kotoryye otvergayut chast' yego. Skazhi [, Mukhammad]: "Voistinu, mne vedeno poklonyat'sya Allakhu i ne poklonyat'sya naryadu s nim drugim bogam. K Nemu ya vzyvayu, i k Nemu budet moye vozvrashcheniye
